tokens.en: "No single arrow can pierce an entire flock."

tokens.en: It is ancient, immense, and irresistible.
tokens.kr: It is ancient, immense, and irresistible.

tokens.en: "Those who stood in my path now lay behind me."
tokens.kr: "Those who stood in my path now lay behind me."

tokens.en: Their fires burn quietly, allowing the phoenixes to glide silently through the canyon.
tokens.kr: Their fires burn quietly, allowing the phoenixes to glide silently through the canyon.

tokens.en: Not even the tallest tree stands a chance against the underside of a dinosaur's foot.

tokens.en: "Watch carefully. The gap between death and victory is thinner than your blade."
tokens.kr: "Watch carefully. The gap between death and victory is thinner than your blade."

tokens.en: "Lately I've seen the biggest bounties of my career—and for the biggest names."
tokens.kr: "Lately I've seen the biggest bounties of my career—and for the biggest names."

tokens.en: Selesnya guildmages do not sleep so the rest of the Conclave can.
tokens.kr: Selesnya guildmages do not sleep so the rest of the Conclave can.

tokens.en: "Oh, you fellas are going to love the lockup. Excellent gruel. Very low ceilings."\n—Libuse, Boros sergeant
tokens.kr: "Oh, you fellas are going to love the lockup. Excellent gruel. Very low ceilings."\n—Libuse, Boros sergeant

tokens.en: "Reports of Gruul rioters in four districts. Start with the big ones and work your way up."\n—Libuse, Boros sergeant
tokens.kr: "Reports of Gruul rioters in four districts. Start with the big ones and work your way up."\n—Libuse, Boros sergeant

tokens.en: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.
tokens.kr: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

tokens.en: "To wage war, secure peace within yourself."\n—Emmara
tokens.kr: "To wage war, secure peace within yourself."\n—Emmara

tokens.en: There's no greater honor than joining your chosen guild, and no greater shame than failing it.
tokens.kr: There's no greater honor than joining your chosen guild, and no greater shame than failing it.

tokens.en: The angels appreciated the offer but politely declined to eat any birdseed.
tokens.kr: The angels appreciated the offer but politely declined to eat any birdseed.

tokens.en: "Yes, there's competition between our equenauts and the Boros skyjeks. At least they think it's a competition."
tokens.kr: "Yes, there's competition between our equenauts and the Boros skyjeks. At least they think it's a competition."

tokens.en: "You won't need the sword drills, your shields, or my blessing. You'll fight for Sunhome with the truth in your heart."\n—Aurelia
tokens.kr: "You won't need the sword drills, your shields, or my blessing. You'll fight for Sunhome with the truth in your heart."\n—Aurelia

tokens.en: Ravnica's convoluted power structure often boils down to who can muster the most swords on a given block.
tokens.kr: Ravnica's convoluted power structure often boils down to who can muster the most swords on a given block.

tokens.en: The wounded see the glow of its vials long before they see its wings diving out of the clouds.
tokens.kr: The wounded see the glow of its vials long before they see its wings diving out of the clouds.

tokens.en: He ferried weapons, spells, exotic animals—but his most dangerous cargo was the truth.
tokens.kr: He ferried weapons, spells, exotic animals—but his most dangerous cargo was the truth.

tokens.en: There are two lives: the life you live before you see a unicorn, and the life you live after.
tokens.kr: There are two lives: the life you live before you see a unicorn, and the life you live after.

tokens.en: Good at carrying things. Really good at knocking them down.
tokens.kr: Good at carrying things. Really good at knocking them down.

tokens.en: "I've raised her since she was a pup, and she's raised me since I was a recruit."
tokens.kr: "I've raised her since she was a pup, and she's raised me since I was a recruit."

tokens.en: "Article 5.8.2. Ensure proper restraint of any and all arms, legs, claws, jaws, tails, tentacles, and tendrils as appropriate."\n—Azorius Arrester Procedure, Appendix B
tokens.kr: "Article 5.8.2. Ensure proper restraint of any and all arms, legs, claws, jaws, tails, tentacles, and tendrils as appropriate."\n—Azorius Arrester Procedure, Appendix B

tokens.en: "Too many have disappeared in these dark days. I am the light that will lead them home."
tokens.kr: "Too many have disappeared in these dark days. I am the light that will lead them home."

tokens.en: "The Golgari believe they should be given what they deserve. On this we agree."\n—Tajic
tokens.kr: "The Golgari believe they should be given what they deserve. On this we agree."\n—Tajic

tokens.en: Rocs' innate fearlessness makes them ideal mounts for emergency response.
tokens.kr: Rocs' innate fearlessness makes them ideal mounts for emergency response.

tokens.en: "Sometimes an angel passes by and gives me a little nod, like, ‘You're a daring one!' That always makes my day."
tokens.kr: "Sometimes an angel passes by and gives me a little nod, like, ‘You're a daring one!' That always makes my day."

tokens.en: "Before I let you wield one of these, let's see you dodge one!"
tokens.kr: "Before I let you wield one of these, let's see you dodge one!"

tokens.en: "The trouble with youths these days is that, in outright defiance of their elders, they refuse to be bought."\n—Karlov of the Ghost Council
tokens.kr: "The trouble with youths these days is that, in outright defiance of their elders, they refuse to be bought."\n—Karlov of the Ghost Council

tokens.en: In the quiet before a battle, Boros soldiers whisper prayers that steady their nerves and focus their minds.
tokens.kr: In the quiet before a battle, Boros soldiers whisper prayers that steady their nerves and focus their minds.

tokens.en: "The Tenth has always been my home. This city is constantly embroiled in one crisis or another, but I'm determined to protect my piece."
tokens.kr: "The Tenth has always been my home. This city is constantly embroiled in one crisis or another, but I'm determined to protect my piece."

tokens.en: "My specialty is theoretical universal limits and ways to circumvent them."
tokens.kr: "My specialty is theoretical universal limits and ways to circumvent them."

tokens.en: All those who trade in questions must answer to the Dimir.
tokens.kr: All those who trade in questions must answer to the Dimir.

tokens.en: First, dispose of the evidence. Then dispose of your knowledge of its disposal.
tokens.kr: First, dispose of the evidence. Then dispose of your knowledge of its disposal.

tokens.en: The letters arrive, all sealed and read.
tokens.kr: The letters arrive, all sealed and read.

tokens.en: "Laws apply only to those who lack the vision to see past them."
tokens.kr: "Laws apply only to those who lack the vision to see past them."

tokens.en: Beneath Ravnica's streets runs a layer of tunnels, then caverns and waterways, then terrors and nightmares.
tokens.kr: Beneath Ravnica's streets runs a layer of tunnels, then caverns and waterways, then terrors and nightmares.

tokens.en: "Who are the agents of the Dimir? No one and everyone."\n—Lazav
tokens.kr: "Who are the agents of the Dimir? No one and everyone."\n—Lazav

tokens.en: In a climate of suspicion, Isperia gathered the guilds to propose a radical idea: cooperation.
tokens.kr: In a climate of suspicion, Isperia gathered the guilds to propose a radical idea: cooperation.

tokens.en: "Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."\n—Yolov, Simic bioengineer
tokens.kr: "Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."\n—Yolov, Simic bioengineer

tokens.en: Rumors float through the city like crows, alighting on citizens seemingly at random.
tokens.kr: Rumors float through the city like crows, alighting on citizens seemingly at random.

tokens.en: A composer wrote a symphony based on the drakes screeching outside her window. Reviews were mixed—except among the drakes.
tokens.kr: A composer wrote a symphony based on the drakes screeching outside her window. Reviews were mixed—except among the drakes.

tokens.en: "What bait do you cast to catch a dream?"\n—Ravnican riddle
tokens.kr: "What bait do you cast to catch a dream?"\n—Ravnican riddle

tokens.en: "We're on the fortieth floor, with one window, no balcony. No one could possibly get in."\n—Minosz, Orzhov chief of security
tokens.kr: "We're on the fortieth floor, with one window, no balcony. No one could possibly get in."\n—Minosz, Orzhov chief of security

tokens.en: She memorized every arcane text in the Ismeri Library by the time she was sixteen. Now she quizzes sphinxes in her spare time.
tokens.kr: She memorized every arcane text in the Ismeri Library by the time she was sixteen. Now she quizzes sphinxes in her spare time.

tokens.en: "My doors are called trespassing, my signatures, forgeries. They don't respect my talents, and I don't respect their labels."
tokens.kr: "My doors are called trespassing, my signatures, forgeries. They don't respect my talents, and I don't respect their labels."

tokens.en: "My greatest creation—me!"
tokens.kr: "My greatest creation—me!"

tokens.en: Genius is finding the edge of what's possible, then jumping over it.
tokens.kr: Genius is finding the edge of what's possible, then jumping over it.

tokens.en: "How thoughtful of the Legion to train its soldiers to fit our spell's specifications."\n—Nefara, Dimir agent
tokens.kr: "How thoughtful of the Legion to train its soldiers to fit our spell's specifications."\n—Nefara, Dimir agent

tokens.kr: "We have intel that some guilds have fallen under an invader's influence. Until we're sure, no venture succeeds."\n—Lazav

tokens.en: The first thing the mist chills is the mind. Victims never cry out or even murmur in surprise.
tokens.kr: The first thing the mist chills is the mind. Victims never cry out or even murmur in surprise.

tokens.en: "There's no need to sound the alarm. You are minding your post admirably. I am authorized. All is well."
tokens.kr: "There's no need to sound the alarm. You are minding your post admirably. I am authorized. All is well."

tokens.en: Fog haunts the streets, rendering the familiar as otherworldly, changing neighbors into shadows, and muffling cries for help.

tokens.en: "What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones."\n—Omik, superintendent of waterworks
tokens.kr: "What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones."\n—Omik, superintendent of waterworks

tokens.en: The Dimir rarely make statements, but when they do, the message is clear.
tokens.kr: The Dimir rarely make statements, but when they do, the message is clear.

tokens.en: "Bats are welcome to eat thousands of my pets. I have multitudes more that will ultimately eat the bats."\n—Izoni
tokens.kr: "Bats are welcome to eat thousands of my pets. I have multitudes more that will ultimately eat the bats."\n—Izoni

tokens.en: "Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"\n—Izoni
tokens.kr: "Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"\n—Izoni

tokens.en: No guilds—that is her rule. The House vampires unnerve her. The Combine would dissect her, the Legion burn her, the Conclave "cure" her. The shadows are all the family she needs.
tokens.kr: No guilds—that is her rule. The House vampires unnerve her. The Combine would dissect her, the Legion burn her, the Conclave "cure" her. The shadows are all the family she needs.

tokens.en: All things considered, his first day on patrol could have gone better.
tokens.kr: All things considered, his first day on patrol could have gone better.

tokens.en: The sound of every twisted secret tempts you to hear another.
tokens.kr: The sound of every twisted secret tempts you to hear another.
